title: why is the prison in Wilmington nicknamed 025"?"
text:
Years ago, the state prisons were assigned numbers and 025 was the one that designated the one here. The numbers were later dropped and itÍs now called the New Hanover Correctional Facility.

HereÍs a link with some more history of the place:

http://www.myreporter.com/2009/08/what-is-the-new-hanover-county-prison/
